description: This file declares the interface for the HTTP Bmo Response object, including function prototypes for creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization of the object.

methods.name: HttpCreateBmoRep
methods.description: Factory function to create an instance of the HTTP Bmo Response object.

methods.name: HttpBmoRepCreate
methods.description: Creates a new Bmo Response object with specified context handles.

methods.name: HttpBmoRepRemove
methods.description: Removes and deallocates the Bmo Response object.

methods.name: HttpBmoRepEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the Bmo Response instance.
